newsitem.title: USA: Universal Outdoor to acquire billboard co.
newsitem.headline: Universal Outdoor to acquire billboard co.

text.p: Universal Outdoor Holdings Inc said on Tuesday that it agreed to acquire Outdoor Advertising Holding Inc, the parent company of POA Acquisition Corp, in a cash transaction valued at about $240 million.
Under the deal, Universal Outdoor Holdings will create a new subsidiary, which would then be merged with the POA Acquisition Corp entity, said Universal Chief Financial Officer Brian Clingen.
POA operates about 6,400 billboards in seven markets. Universal Outdoor Holdings operates about 12,700 billboards in eight markets.
